00020 #include "ds_util.h"
00021 #include "ro_file.h"
00022 
00023 #include <sys/ioctl.h>
00024 
00025 #include <l4/re/env>
00026 
00027 namespace L4Re { namespace Core {
00028 
00029 
00030 Simple_store<Ro_file> Ro_file::store __attribute__((init_priority(1000)));
00031 
00032 
00033 void *
00034 Ro_file::operator new(size_t s) throw()
00035 {
00036   if (s != sizeof(Ro_file))
00037     return 0;
00038 
00039   return store.alloc();
00040 }
00041 
00042 void
00043 Ro_file::operator delete(void *b) throw()
00044 {
00045   store.free(b);
00046 }
00047 
00048 
00049 Ro_file::~Ro_file() throw()
00050 {
00051   if (_addr)
00052     L4Re::Env::env()->rm()->detach(l4_addr_t(_addr), 0);
00053 
00054   release_ds(_ds);
00055 }
00056 
00057 int
00058 Ro_file::fstat64(struct stat64 *buf) const throw()
00059 {
00060   static int fake = 0;
00061 
00062   memset(buf, 0, sizeof(*buf));
00063   buf->st_size = _size;
00064   buf->st_mode = S_IFREG | 0644;
00065   buf->st_dev = _ds.cap();
00066   buf->st_ino = ++fake;
00067   buf->st_blksize = L4_PAGESIZE;
00068   buf->st_blocks = l4_round_page(_size);
00069   return 0;
00070 }
00071 
00072 ssize_t
00073 Ro_file::read_single(const struct iovec *vec, off64_t pos) throw()
00074 {
00075   off64_t l = vec->iov_len;
00076   if (_size - pos < l)
00077     l = _size - pos;
00078 
00079   if (l > 0)
00080     {
00081       Vfs_config::memcpy(vec->iov_base, _addr + pos, l);
00082       return l;
00083     }
00084 
00085   return 0;
00086 }
00087 
00088 ssize_t
00089 Ro_file::preadv(const struct iovec *vec, int cnt, off64_t offset) throw()
00090 {
00091   if (!_addr)
00092     {
00093       void const *file = (void*)L4_PAGESIZE;
00094       long err = L4Re::Env::env()->rm()->attach(&file, _size,
00095                                                 Rm::Search_addr | Rm::Read_only,
00096                                                 _ds, 0);
00097 
00098       if (err < 0)
00099   return err;
00100 
00101       _addr = (char const *)file;
00102     }
00103 
00104   ssize_t l = 0;
00105 
00106   while (cnt > 0)
00107     {
00108       ssize_t r = read_single(vec, offset);
00109       offset += r;
00110       l += r;
00111 
00112       if ((size_t)r < vec->iov_len)
00113   return l;
00114 
00115       ++vec;
00116       --cnt;
00117     }
00118   return l;
00119 }
00120 
00121 ssize_t
00122 Ro_file::pwritev(const struct iovec *, int, off64_t) throw()
00123 {
00124   return -EROFS;
00125 }
00126 
00127 int
00128 Ro_file::ioctl(unsigned long v, va_list args) throw()
00129 {
00130   switch (v)
00131     {
00132     case FIONREAD: // return amount of data still available
00133       int *available = va_arg(args, int *);
00134       *available = _size - pos();
00135       return 0;
00136     };
00137   return -EINVAL;
00138 }
00139 
00140 }}
